name: PPT: CHAPTER TWO
description:
Welcome to PPT: CHAPTER TWO.

More chapters will be coming soon.

You play as a test subject in a facility run by an AI. You are designated to the PPT (Pull Pull Test) program and will test out tools such as the Velocitor Model-1, a tool which allows users to push and pull themselves through the air.

Is everything at Downes Labs normal?

Follow me on Twitter for more updates: @omogonix

This version of the game comes with both Chapter 1 & 2. Also, if you run out of energy during a test and are stranded, you can press R to reset. :) You can do it in the first chapter too.

If you have any issues or problems with the game, let me know in the comments! :)
